text: Very welcoming congregation, from the porridge breakfast served before the service to the greeter who Sat with me as a newcomer to those who helped me find the bus home. Methodist welcome at it's best.

It's my own church for the past 32+ years so my review would be the coloured lens of an "insider". It's a safe place and increasingly welcoming. Many things to participate in, only limited by your own willingness to open up and build your life here.

A historic methodist church situated at dover rd . Bus 196 passes here .down commonweath avenue ,queenway, redhill, cantonment rd . Walking down the rd , just cross the main rd. You will reach one-north mrt station.  It helps elder people to study bible, christtian faith.  Worship the god fo lead a peaceful elder life.
Love attending this church because it has a traditional service. The congregation are friendly.
Very good place to worship our God.
